Class CheckListRenderer

java.lang.Object

                          cm.view.render.CheckListRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ListCellRenderer, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class CheckListRenderer
extends javax.swing.JCheckBox
implements javax.swing.ListCellRenderer

Defines a renderer for a JList cell that includes a checkbox.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Rinehart <gomamon2k at yahoo.com>
